column4: Hello, I have an unusable system that I would like to get a large amount of data off of. I can use a install CD to boot into rescue mode, is it possible to mount a network drive or at the very least use SSH/SCP to transfer data?
I'd get an external HDD and backup all the stuff you need on to it with ubuntu livecd. Then, install afreash and move everything back
i think that might be the best option, thanks, I'll see if I can dig one out
